description:
You’ve never seen the girls quite like this! Catch Jo and Meg in their first adventure, off duty and ready to celebrate - until events in New York City deflate their good cheer. A member of Meg’s old gang is in the hospital, recovery uncertain. With the cowardly freak responsible still on the loose, Jo calls for vengeance and the girls are on the hunt again - and this time it’s personal!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヅョウとメグのブルース
